#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
#define w(t) while(t--)
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define SLL(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%d",x)
#define fl(i , a, b) for(i = (int)a; i<(int)b; i++)
#define mem(a , value) memset(a , value , sizeof(a))
#define tr(c, itr) for(itr = (c).begin(); itr != (c).end(); itr++)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 1000000010
#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
typedef pair<int,int> pp;
int a[1234567];
std::vector<int> v[100002] , v1[100002] ;
int vis[100002] ,c =0 ;
void dfs(int u )
{
	vis[u]=1;
	c++; 
	for (int i = 0; i < v1[u].size(); ++i)
		if(!vis[v1[u][i]]) dfs(v1[u][i]); 
	return ; 
}
int main()
{
	//std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int  n , i , ui , vi; char ch ; 
	cin>>n;
	fl(i , 0 , n-1)
	{
		cin>>ui>>vi ; 
		v[ui].pb(vi);
		v[vi].pb(ui);
	}
	for(i = 1; i <= n ;i++)
	{
		cin>>ch ; 
		if(ch=='W') a[i] =0 ; else a[i] = 1;
	}
	for(i = 1; i <= n ; i++)
	{
		for(int j = 0 ; j < (int)v[i].size(); j++)
		{
			if(a[v[i][j]] != a[i])
			{
				v1[i].pb(v[i][j]); 
			}
		}
	}
	 ll ans =0 ; 
	for(int i =1; i <= n ; i++)
	{
		if(!vis[i]){
			c =0 ; 
			dfs(i); 
			ll p = c*(c+1)/2;
			ans = (ans + p)%MOD; 
		}
	}
	cout<<ans<<endl;
	return 0;
}
